articles.description: Warriors star Draymond Green has apologized for punching former teammate Jordan Poole and says it is time to move on from the incident that fractured their locker room over two years ago.
articles.headline: Green expounds on latest Poole apology, wants him to move on

images.name: Kevin Durant [600x400]
images.caption: Suns star Kevin Durant, back at Barclays Center for the second time since he was traded in 2023, said he still feels "love" when he returns to Brooklyn.
images.credit: Photo by David L. Nemec/NBAE via Getty Images

articles.description: Suns star Kevin Durant, back for his second trip to Barclays Center since being traded, said he is proud of what the Nets were building despite the "dysfunction" that prevented him, Kyrie Irving and James Harden from taking the court together.
articles.headline: Kevin Durant still feels 'love' in Brooklyn despite chaotic stint
